command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&     ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/0/9/dataset_e09185fb-7712-4e5f-915c-017076272277.dat' infile && ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/_metadata_files/0/8/6/metadata_086a0061-ea2e-48ea-9d35-9d8157fa7e82.dat' infile.bai &&         sample_fragment=`samtools idxstats infile | awk '{s+=$4+$3} END {frac=s/20; print(frac > 1 ? 13797+1/frac : ".0")}'` &&  samtools view -@ $addthreads -b    -s ${sample_fragment}   -o outfile      infile
